data.title: Netflix says 'We're having trouble playing this title right now.'
data.meta_description: If you get the error message 'We're having trouble playing this title right now,' use this article to fix the problem.
data.text:
We're having trouble playing this title right now

This error can happen when a network issue stops your device from reaching Netflix, or if there's a problem with the TV show or movie you're trying to watch.
